Trade/Device Name(s): Alere i Influenza A & B Control Swab Kit
Regulation Name(s): Respiratory viral panel multiplex nucleic acid assay
Instrumentation for Clinical Multiplex Test Systems
Specimen Type(s): Nasopharyngeal swab eluted in viral transport media
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Alere i Influenza A & B rapid molecular test using isothermal nucleic acid amplification for detection and discrimination of influenza A and B viral RNA
Indications for Use Summary: Qualitative detection and discrimination of influenza A and B viral RNA in nasal and nasopharyngeal swabs from symptomatic patients to aid differential diagnosis of influenza A and B infections, intended for use with the Alere i Instrument
